name: blog_crud
description: blog crud for Vue Sqlite and Electron

scripts.rebuild-sqlite3-win32: cd node_modules/sqlite3  && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v46-win32-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=1.7.10 --arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.7-win32-x64

author: kamrul
